short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visualize key metrics of any GitHub repository

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GitSnap transforms GitHub repository data into engaging charts using the Echarts library, providing insights into contributors' activity, branches, pull requests, and issue statistics.

Highlights:
- Get insights into key contributors to your project or any project.
- Track the status of open and merged pull requests over time.
- Monitor issues both open and closed issues over time.
- View branches to understand their relationships and hierarchy.
- Choose which features you want to visualize with a custom toggle.
